BVRIT HYDERABAD College of Engineering for Women is the youngest college under the umbrella of Sri Vishnu Educational Society, Established in 2012, with the intention of enabling women engineers to reach greater heights, it has already acquired many accolades in academics, placements and technical competitions.

patterns: What is the vision of BVRITH
responses: BVRITH VISION-To be a World Class University providing value-based education, conducting interdisciplinary research in cutting edge technologies leading to sustainable socio-economic development of the nation.

VEDIC ,VSSC(Vishnu Student Success Center),WISE(Women in Software Technology),ATL(Assistive Technology Lab),GSAC(Graduate Study Abroad Center),Drone Technology Lab, EDC,SDG,NASSCOM,Counselling by Psychologist are few differentiators of BVRITH.

patterns: What is the mission of BVRITH
responses:
BVRITH MISSION-To produce technically competent and socially responsible engineers, managers and entrepreneurs, who will be future ready.
 To involve students and faculty in innovative research projects linked with industry, academic and research institutions in India and abroad.
 To use modern pedagogy for improving the teaching-learning process.
You can call me BVRITH BOT.
I'm BVRITH

patterns: what is the fee of each semester
what is the fees of each year
tell me something about the fees
responses:
BVRIT Hyderabad fee structure is approximately as follows:

Undergraduate Programs (B.Tech):
- Tuition Fee: ₹90,000 – ₹1,75,000 per year (varies by batch)
- NBA Fee: ₹3,000
- JNTUH/Miscellaneous Fee: ₹2,500 – ₹5,500

Postgraduate Programs (M.Tech):
- Tuition Fee: ₹1,00,000 per year
- JNTUH/Miscellaneous Fee: ₹5,500

For detailed and updated fee structure, visit: https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/admission/fee-details/

patterns: how far is hostel from college
responses: BVRIT Hyderabad College of Engineering for Women offers on-campus hostel facilities with 4 blocks comprising over 150 rooms, accommodating more than 500 students. The hostel provides 24/7 water supply, geyser systems, nutritious food, a gym, yoga and sports facilities, and a common room for socializing. Each block is supervised by experienced lady wardens and security officers to ensure safety. The hostel is ragging-free, with an anti-ragging squad monitoring activities. For more details, visit https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/admission/hostel/

patterns: does the college have library facility
Tell me about the library at BVRIT Hyderabad
What facilities does the BVRIT Hyderabad library offer?
Does BVRIT Hyderabad have a digital library?
What are the library timings at BVRIT Hyderabad?
responses: BVRIT Hyderabad College of Engineering for Women offers a comprehensive library equipped with a vast collection of books, journals, and digital resources. The library provides access to online databases like IEEE-ASPP and J-GATE, and features a digital library with internet-enabled computers for accessing NPTEL lectures and online tests. Remote access to resources is available through the KNIMBUS platform. The library operates from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM on working days, with book issuance from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM.

patterns: Give me information about placements at BVRITH
which company provides highest package at BVRITH?
which company provides higher package at BVRITH?
which company provides high package at BVRITH?
which company provides max package at BVRITH?
which company provides maximum package at BVRITH?
what is the average offer at BVRITH?
on average what is the package offered in BVRITH?
which company provides lowest package at BVRITH?
responses: Over 100 companies, including top MNCs and core companies, visit BVRIT Hyderabad every year. In recent batches, more than 950 students were placed. Microsoft offered the highest package of RS.52 LPA, followed by Amazon with Rs.48.6 LPA and VISA with Rs.32.76 LPA. The average salary package ranges between Rs.4 LPA and Rs.6 LPA, with the lowest being around Rs.3.75 LPA. For more information, visit https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/placements/placement-details/

patterns: How does BVRITH help students prepare for placements?
What kind of placement training is provided?
What preparation support is given for campus placements?
Do they train for coding interviews?
Is there aptitude training at BVRITH?
Does BVRITH offer soft skill training?
responses: BVRIT Hyderabad offers comprehensive placement training programs to help students prepare for campus recruitment. The training includes aptitude, logical reasoning, and verbal ability sessions; coding and problem-solving practice for technical interviews; soft skills training; and mock interviews with real-time feedback. Special focus is given to competitive coding and group discussions. Training is conducted in collaboration with industry experts and training partners.

patterns: what is the name of principal

responses: Dr.K.V.N.Sunitha is the principal of BVRITH.

patterns: Who is the chairman of BVRITH?
Who is the head of the college?
what is the name of chairman
responses: The Chairman of BVRIT Hyderabad is Sri K. V. Vishnu Raju. He is an accomplished industrialist and educationist, and took over the role after the passing of the founder, Padma Bhushan Dr. B. V. Raju, in 2002. He holds degrees from NIT Trichy and Michigan Technological University, USA. Under his leadership, the Sri Vishnu Educational Society has grown into a group of premier educational institutions. Learn more at: https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/management/

patterns: Who is the secretary of BVRITH?
Who is the secretary of the college?
what is the name of general secretary
what is the general secretary name
responses: The Secretary of BVRIT Hyderabad is Sri K. Aditya Vissam. He is the youngest member of the Sri Vishnu Educational Society's management team. Aditya Vissam holds a degree in Industrial Engineering from Penn State University, USA, and an MBA from Imperial College, London. He has professional experience with companies in the US and UK, including Office Depot in Minneapolis and Amazon in London. He brings valuable insights into quality education and future skills integration across SVES institutions. Learn more at: https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/management/

patterns: Who is the joint secretary of BVRITH?
Tell me about the joint secretary
Who is the joint secretary of the college?
what is the name of joint secretary
what is the joint secretary name
responses: The Joint Secretary of Sri Vishnu Educational Society, which oversees BVRIT Hyderabad, is Sri K. Sai Sumant. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Materials Science and Engineering from The Pennsylvania State University and an MBA from the University of California, Irvine. Sri Sai Sumant has professional experience as an R&D Engineer at Glidewell Dental in the USA and is currently serving as the Executive Director at Anjani Tiles Limited. He brings valuable insights into research and development to the institution. Learn more at: https://vishnuschool.edu.in/JointSecretary

patterns: Who is the vice chairman of BVRITH?

What is the vice chairman name?
responses: The Vice Chairman of Sri Vishnu Educational Society, which oversees BVRIT Hyderabad, is Sri Ravichandran Rajagopal. He holds a Bachelor of Technology in Mechanical Engineering from NIT Tiruchirappalli and an MBA from IIM Calcutta. He has professional experience in business development and new product development with Novartis India. Learn more at: https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/

Semester exams at BVRIT Hyderabad are typically conducted at the end of each academic term as per the JNTUH academic calendar. These exams are held offline in most cases and include both internal assessments (mid exams) and external end-semester exams. Students should check the official college portal or notice board regularly for updates on exam timetables, hall tickets, and guidelines.

patterns: number of seats in each branch
how many stundent are taken in each branch
responses:
BVRIT Hyderabad College of Engineering for Women offers a total intake of 540 seats for its B.Tech programs. The distribution across various branches is as follows:

- Computer Science and Engineering (CSE): 180 seats
- CSE with Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning: 60 seats
-  Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE): 120 seats
- Electrical and Electronics Engineering (EEE): 60 seats
- Information Technology (IT): 120 seats

These details are based on the information provided by the college's official sources.

responses:
BVRIT Hyderabad College of Engineering for Women has a diverse and experienced faculty across various departments. For detailed information about the faculty members in each department, you can visit the respective department's faculty page:

- [Computer Science and Engineering Faculty](https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/computer-science-and-engineering/faculty/)
- [Information Technology Faculty](https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/information-technology/faculty/)
- [Basic Sciences and Humanities Faculty](https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/basic-sciences-and-humanities/faculty/)
- [Electronics and Communication Engineering Faculty](https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/electronics-and-communication-engineering/faculty/)
- [Electrical and Electronics Engineering Faculty](https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/electrical-and-electronics-engineering/faculty/)
- [CSE - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Faculty](https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/cse-artificial-intelligence-and-machine-learning/faculty/)

These pages provide comprehensive details about the faculty members, including their designations, qualifications, and areas of expertise.

BVRIT Hyderabad offers undergraduate (B.Tech) programs in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), Information Technology (IT), Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE), Electrical and Electronics Engineering (EEE), and Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning (AIML). It also offers postgraduate (M.Tech) programs in Data Science, Computer Science and Engineering, and VLSI Design.

Yes,  BVRIT Hyderabad College of Engineering for Women offers a range of internship opportunities across various industries. For detailed information on available internships, please visit the official internships page: [BVRIT Hyderabad Internships](https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/placements/internships/)

patterns: What is the EAMCET code for BVRIT Hyderabad?
Tell me the PGECET code for BVRIT Hyderabad
responses: The EAMCET code for BVRIT Hyderabad College of Engineering for Women is BVRW.
The PGECET code for BVRIT Hyderabad College of Engineering for Women is BVRW1.
Use BVRW for TS EAMCET and BVRW1 for TS PGECET when selecting BVRIT Hyderabad during counseling.

BVRIT Hyderabad is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Hyderabad (JNTUH), and has been granted autonomous status by the University Grants Commission (UGC). It is also accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA) for EEE, ECE, CSE, and IT programs, and by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) with an 'A' grade. Learn more at: https://bvrithyderabad.edu.in/about-bvrith/
